content: 1 row 10 *k2 p2* twice sl next 3 sts to cable needle and hold in front k2 sl the purl st from cable needle back to left-hand needle and purl it then k2 from cable needle p2 k2 p2 row 11-16 repeat row 3-8 mitten top  repeat row 1-16 twice more decrease row over all 38 sts in the round row 1 *k2 p2tog* twice k2 p1 *k2 p2tog* twice *k2 k2tog* twice k3 *k2 k2tog* twice = 30 sts row 2 k2 p1 front cross sl next 3 sts to cable needle and hold in back k2 sl the purl st from cable needle back to left-hand needle and purl it then k2 from cable needle back cross p1 k to end row 3 k2 p2tog k1 k2tog k1 p1 k1 k2tog k1 p2tog k2 *k2tog k1* twice k2 k2tog k1 k2tog = 22 sts row 4 k2 p1 *k3 p1* twice k to end row 5 k1 k2tog five times k1 k2tog five times = 12 sts  evenly distribute the remaining 12 sts on 2 needles and graft with kitchener stitch tutorial here http //knitty com/issuesummer04/feattheresasum04 html thumbs  take the 13 thumb sts off holder and place onto circular needle s or dpns  join in the round picking up 3 sts over the gap = 16 sts  knit in the round for 2 inches or until the top of the thumbnail  k2tog eight times break yarn thread yarn tail through remaining 8 sts and pull through weave in all yarn tails wet block mittens into shape and enjoy abbreviations st s stitch es k knit sl slip_stitch purlwise onto left needle p purl pm place marker k2tog knit two sts together slm slip marker p2tog purl two sts together m1l make one left-leaning increase with left needle pick up the bar between the two sts from the front knit into it through the back of the stitch m1r make one right-leaning increase with left needle pick up the bar between the two sts from the back knit into it through the front of the stitch bc back cross slip 1 st to cable needle and hold in back k2 then p1 from cable needle fc front cross slip 2 sts to cable needle and hold in front p1 then k2 from cable needle 2
